extendedInfo.description: Flitto is a social translation platform that lets you access all kinds of content from your favorite celebrities and brands in your own native language. Follow celebrities, groups, and companies regardless of the source language. Earn points and karma from other fans for your translation work. Flitto is perfect for social postings, (Twitter, FB Weibo etc) articles. comics travel information etc.Flitto.com is people powered, community verified, crowdsourced content.FLITTO doesnât just break the language barrier.. it smashes right through it.For questions please contact help@flitto.comFeatures:*Practice you own translation and second language skills on topics you actually care about.*Earn points when you translate and let like minded individuals help you refine your translation skills*Access content about your passions in your own language.*Help share your love of awesome things & people with other fans around the world*Practice you own translation and second language skills on topics you actually care about.**Earn points when you translate & the gratitude of your favorite stars & Brands

reviews.title: App keep crashing
reviews.comment: The app overall is very good as in it connects us with our idol group with all language translation that we need.. but after this latest update, it keep on crashing and to force shut it, unable to load pics or comments, pls fix it and i will definitely give it a 5star!
reviews.author: bee kyu

reviews.title: Daebakk
reviews.comment: I use this app because of Jonghyun oppa\'s recomendation, and it works really well, just some minor problem, i can\'t find some artist\'s sns (twitter and instagram) if you could fix it i would give 5 stars!!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Love the app. It\'ll be fantastic if i can change my username.

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Using this app, i am able to understand what my favourite kpop celebrities tweet! Love it~
reviews.author: Debby Ong

reviews.title: Mostly ok, can\'t contribute to the translation process
reviews.comment: It works in that I can open it and see the translations and i like how its more than just twitter, they have instagram, me2day, and whatever the other sites are that the artist use. But how it works is that everyone translates the posts. Like, someone will post something and a different user on flitto translates it, which is fine. But when it tries to get me to translate it crashes and I can\'t try and translate whatever  it was and this has happened with more than one artist/tweet.
reviews.author: Jessica Russell

reviews.title: It can\'t opened
reviews.comment: It\'s always closed when I try to use it. Please fix it!
